definition: Bacillariophyta, phylum of diatom single-celled phytoplankton

sentences.english: Diatoms are also quite numerous, with the estimated number of species exceeding one million.
sentences.chinese: 硅藻种类也相当多，估计超过1百万种。

sentences.english: No significant correlation was observed between diatom red tide and alongshore pollutants discharge.
sentences.chinese: 而近岸排污与硅藻赤潮发生的相关性不明显。

sentences.english: One of the two silicified halves of the cell wall of a diatom.
sentences.chinese: 瓣硅藻的两片硅化的细胞壁之一。

sentences.english: The median groove of a diatom valve.
A light soil consisting of siliceous diatom remains and often used as a filtering material.
sentences.chinese: 由硅藻土残留物的通常用来作为过滤材料的轻质土。

sentences.english: Some essential nutrients necessary for reproduction of copepods are insufficient in diatom cells.
sentences.chinese: 高浓度硅藻对桡足类繁殖的抑制机制。

sentences.english: The cell number and species of Bacillariophyta account for an absolute predominance.
sentences.chinese: 以硅藻门的细胞个数和种数都占绝对优势。

sentences.english: In this paper, the adsorption of diatomaceous earth which is applied to deodorized paper is determined.
sentences.chinese: 研究了填加硅藻土作除臭纸的除臭效果。

sentences.english: It can be massively cultivated for MPD in the special optimum media.
sentences.chinese: 海洋浮游硅藻在优化专业培养基上可进行大规模培养。

sentences.english: Diatomaceous earths are the skeletal remains of the tiny aquatic plants deposited centuries ago.
sentences.chinese: 硅藻土是百年前水生植物沉淀下来的遗骸。

sentences.english: Commonly used filter aid agent diatomite, have fibrin.
sentences.chinese: 常用的助滤剂有硅藻土，纤维素等。

sentences.english: The candle type diatomite filter is most ideal.
sentences.chinese: 过滤设备以烛式硅藻土过滤机为好。

sentences.english: The callback of distilled liquor from deposed diatomite was discussed as well.
sentences.chinese: 阐述了从废硅藻土中回收白酒。

sentences.english: Diatoms may have other advantages when it comes to oil production.
sentences.chinese: 在产油方面，硅藻可能还有其他优势。
